def_cn: 专科院校;学院;(美国的)私立中学
def_en: Academy is sometimes used in the names of schools and colleges, especially those specializing in particular subjects or skills, or private high schools in the United States.

def_cn: （某一领域的）学会，研究院
def_en: Academy appears in the names of some societies formed to improve or maintain standards in a particular field.
